law.history: Amended 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 45, sec. 1, effective June 24, 2015; ch. 59, sec. 1, effective June 24, 2015; and ch. 106, sec. 3, effective June 24, 2015. -- Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 533, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 120, sec. 9, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 374, sec. 2, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 232, sec. 1, effective April 1, 1998. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 331, sec. 2, effective April 10, 1996. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 66, sec. 2, effective March 16, 1994.

metadata.lrc-note: (6/24/2015). This statute was amended by 2015 Ky. Acts chs. 45, 59, and 106, which do not appear to be in conflict and have been codified together. (6/24/2015). 2015 HB 525, which became Acts ch. 106, proposed to amend this statute in Section 3 of that bill to incorporate earlier amendments made in 2015 SB 33, which became Acts ch. 59, and then amend this statute further. During codification, the Reviser of Statutes has corrected a manifest clerical or typographical error by supplying language contained in the earlier amendment that was overlooked and omitted from the HB 525 amendment.
